lines.text: I don't know what you people mean. How far is they from me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're probably about 40 or so feet from you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I guess I'll doggy paddle up ten feet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like a turtle.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll sea turtle up to them, ten, 15 feet, so I'm within 30 feet, and then I will fire my crossbow. It's at disadvantage because it's in the water?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, crossbow does not get hit with that problem because they're piercing. However, what's your inside range? It's 30 feet?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 30 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then yeah, as long as you're inside range, then you're fine. You swim up there towards it, as you're kicking your feet and cocking the bolt back into it, and go to aim, just within range. You see it as it's turning around to attempt to swim away at full speed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did it just take its turn?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to hold my action.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? Why?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let him! Let her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, no one's near it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we're trying not to let it get away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I know, but aren't you going to go up there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nobody will be able to get up there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, I could, but I don't want to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't want them reporting back to people.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess, if it just took its turn, then there will be Yasha--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm drunk. I'm going to shoot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's not a lot of people that can get over there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's going to be 24 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 27 to hit, or something like that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a lot, but it's only 1d6. Oh hey, it's a six.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Plus five. So 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 points of piercing damage to the shallow priest. You see another plume of dark ichor pouring out the side of its wound, as the bolt is now about three or four inches jutting out of the side of its torso. It glances sidelong at you and seems to inspire it to try and move faster. That finishes your turn, Nott?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bonus action, shoot again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kill it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that's a three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not so much on that one, unfortunately.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can reload!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Finishing that go, Caleb, your turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: From where I'm standing, I see Nott firing drunkenly up at an angle. I'm going to move forward, and peek up in the direction that she is looking, and see the shallow king, and say: Fick das!. I will cast Magic Missile at level three.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fick dish?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's fish dick.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, it's fick das.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not anymore. Fish dick.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fish dick.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) Fish dicks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'd love a nice fish dick right now with some tartar sauce.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I could eat the shit out of those.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A total of 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 damage. All right, how do you want to do this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, you got him!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You killed it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The five of the Magic Missiles will spiral around Fish Dick's head and come in at a different angle, and five of them go (impacts).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It gets some distance. Caleb, feeling comfortable, lets the missiles arc past and up and over as they swirl and gather. They all come in at once, and this darkened shape, suddenly there's a flash of arcane energy and this strange little bubble explosion where it was. The impact happens, and its arms separate from the impact. They hit in the torso, blew it apart from the inside. There's a little cloud of darkness left behind as it begins to slowly disseminate among the rest of the sea water around.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will step back in five feet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Check their corpses. See if they have anything on them that can tell where they came from.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They came from the ocean, Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nott, really, we've got to get over this fear, man. We got a job to do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, they're from the ocean. Where else would they be from?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But where in the ocean, where?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Isn't all the ocean the same?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This one's the Great Barrier Reef. I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Here in the shadowed darkness.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we search the bodies?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll search the bodies.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We search the limbs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're not carrying much on them, per se, beyond the equipment they have and a handful of collected shiny things. A few copper. A key that was scrounged up that's old and very rusted. Looks like maybe a handful of--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Zelda has taught us we want the key.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you have a rusted key.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't do it like that. You know that shit's important.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 11 months from now: Do you have the rusty key?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If only we could close the barrier to the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The shallow priest, since it was destroyed a ways off, some of its accoutrements were left to scatter and float below. You do manage to find, on what pieces you do scrounge up, a heavy necklace made of these larger pearls, probably worth a little bit of gold on the side. That's about it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I hold up one of the fish claws and see if it matches the claws that are on the box?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to take the pearl necklace.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, write that down. Inspecting where the hands meet with the box, no. These are a different size--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You guys, it's not the same fish claws! It's something bigger that had the box.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, fuck you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Slightly larger. At least, it seems--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm out of here, guys. It's been real.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, Nott! We're about to cross the area of the button graveyard that lies beneath the waves.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you hear yourself right now? You sound pathetic. Pathetic!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm just looking out for you, Nott. I don't want you to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I understand when I'm being condescended to, even when I'm drunk!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, let's treat this situation with the seriousness it demands. I douse the lights and bring Frumpkin down onto my own head like a mask, so I can see through Frumpkin vision.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you have a--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like a Zorro mask with Frumpkin's beak right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see these two dark octopus eyes and then this little, unshaven grin poking through underneath.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Little Zemnian man who's like: Can't believe I didn't think of this sooner!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester, I'm sure all that action probably messed up your Locate? Or is it still up somehow?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It only lasts for ten minutes, so I mean, we might be coming to the very end of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say you have a few more minutes on it still because you didn't cast any other concentration spells, and you didn't take any damage, so you're fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's over that way. It's still 700 to 800 feet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Would you lead the way?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How many people got hurt in that fight, by the way? Three of us, I think, took damage?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, ein bisschen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can't hear anything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: While we're walking, it's going to be about a ten-minute walk? Is it insane to--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, as we're walking, I'm going to start Prayer of Healing, I guess. I know it takes about ten minutes, but it's a one-spell heal-all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, if you want to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If that's okay. Everybody gets, oh! 17 points back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll consider that as you guys are traveling. You're helming this journey from that direction? Make a perception check for me, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, yeah. 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester, you see it first and glance over. It's another ship.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Under the water or on the surface?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, another ship, sunken, here. You continue on for another 100 or 150 or so feet, and you see the shape off to the right of another shipwreck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) It's a graveyard.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're definitely in that shit now. The song? Y'all remember the song?

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: The Diver's Grave!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe we should go up for supplies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The spell fades, but you still know the general direction of where it was coming from. Up to you if you want to cast it again or continue on based on the memory.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's continue.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I see any sources of light?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we move stealthily underwater?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can certainly try. You're moving half-speed because of the water, and you're moving at half speed beyond that, moving stealthily. So it's a very slow journey, but you can do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Are you guys moving stealthily or not?

lines.name: MARISHA, LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It'll be a slow journey, but we can try to move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone make a stealth check, and make a stealth check for Yasha as well. You guys are moving at quarter speed, essentially, to move underwater.

lines.name: TALIESIN, LAURA
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 18. Six.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, we're so evil! But the average--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're on the edge there. Continuing forward, it evens out a bit, this gradual, caldera-type valley that rests here before you. The more you begin to watch, now that you're keeping an eye for it, there's a number of areas where wreckage can be seen, some of it very old. The third ship that you pass by, heading in the direction that you recall, has been down here for decades.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why here though? Why all these shipwrecks here? Especially if Sabian planted a bomb on your ship, that's not because of natural causes; is there something about this area that freaks people out or something?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, it's always rough waters and the storms are frequent. You normally make it through with good prep, but I didn't know it was like this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we feel anything? Does it feel weird, like any type of, I don't know, energy? Something? Caduceus, I look at Caduceus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a general wisdom check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, since she's attempting to get in tune with the energy of the atmosphere.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The roll reflects the vaguety of my question. Vaguety. With a big old seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You concentrate for a moment, and the water gets slightly warmer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, I feel better.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ugh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You decide to maybe not walk directly behind Jester.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's all sterile, it's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the little bit of travel you're doing-- they're sparse, but there are a number of ships in this large area that seem to have sunken at different times throughout the years.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I didn't see any source of light?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No source of light, no. Jester, however, who's been at the front keeping a close eye-- a little ways in as you're peering out and clocking in each of these shipwrecks as they come across, you see this little, faint blip of light.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it moving or is it a blip or a what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see it once or twice again. It's a little momentary shine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's like, a light. Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Over at the Frankenstein house?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was waiting for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, it's in front of us, yeah? About how far away is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point of travel, it's about 350, 400 feet ahead of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it around where the orb feels like it is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The general direction.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We need to take a short rest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, I don't think that's--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I won't get any use out of it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 30 minutes; we want to sit here in the open, in the graveyard for an hour?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We keep going, but I think we remember from the song that that could be the lantern light, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Regardless, I'm blind regardless.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe we should fan out a bit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe bioluminescent, just like an underwater creature.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, like a firing line.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should I go up and prep the boat?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, Nott, I need you here. Maybe give ourselves ten feet of distance between each other and fan out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just think about how much damage you did when you were barely even trying.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's all over me!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't see so I'll stick with somebody.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can stick with me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, the clerics are not sticking together.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The clerics do not stay together anymore.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yasha and Beau stay together, the clerics stay together.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Birds of a feather.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll stick with Yasha.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll be with Nott.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll fan out in a wide line as we approach instead of as a group.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. If I could get a marching order, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, this is like when we first started and we were in a line. You guys remember, and we were looking for that witch?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Now we're doing it again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who's together and what?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Am I with you, Jester?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yasha and Clay, and everyone else is singling or--?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb and Nott are together.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then Beau, Jester and Fjord in the middle-ish.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is like the beginning of the campaign.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What a nice book end! You all begin to slowly move forward, keeping your eyes peeled for any sort of movement with no light. It is extremely dark here with that faint little bit of shimmering dull green from above.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I should be on the other side of Fjord, so I'm closer to Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. As you guys continue to move in that direction, some of you begin to see this light as well. Caduceus first, then you, Caleb, and Beau. You see it looks like-- imagine if beams of sunlight managed to roll across a piece of polished metal, a little shining, shifting sight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If she's a big-ass anglerfish I'm going to be so pissed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, nope! I don't want to be eaten. Oh, god.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's definitely a glimmer pot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Glimmer pot?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was in the song.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Treasure in their eyes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we going to just walk straight towards it then or maybe--?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, she has the eye.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think the notion is that you're not supposed to look directly in it, some sort of thing maybe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Don't look at the light?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't look at whatever the eye or light or thing-- I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey. One of us has a familiar that can look for us, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good call.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caleb, send Frumpkin up and see what the lantern light is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so I can do that. I will send Frumpkin low along the bottom in the direction of this thing, stealthily.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you guys staying put or are you continuing to move forward slowly?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ooh, let's take a looky-loo for the moment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all sit tight for a second, halting your position. You watch as the octopus makes its way into the shadow ahead. Caleb, you're focusing, and it takes a while, but Frumpkin eventually, following this tiny, shifting bead of golden light into view. You begin to see towards the center of where this large valley is. There is a large cluster of long dead, pale-white coral that surrounds a rocky stone shelf.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Too real.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check for Frumpkin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bones!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You see this coral space around. It's massive; it's maybe 250, 300 feet across, and it's this dead chunk of coral reef in this vicinity that amassed around this central stone that rises up. There's a small crevasse on the side of it that goes down about 30 or so feet and you can see fish weaving through.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But I did see where this flashing source was?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, but it's occasional.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Occasional, okay. So it's not like there was a creature that Frumpkin and I were able to aim towards, it was just this thing that was appearing and disappearing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, and maybe every now and then reorient the direction that Frumpkin was traveling. As you come to see this space, does Frumpkin continue to get closer?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Frumpkin moves around and it takes a while because Frumpkin isn't very good at perceiving right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thunk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are getting a little impatient here, hearing--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're 300 feet away, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we get within 100 feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keep moving forward slowly. Nott? I'll hold Caleb's hand on the other side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all continue to move forward.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cautiously.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So we're connecting those two groups?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whatever.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're spread out a little.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're spread out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Frumpkin is going around and checking and finds that towards the front of this coral reef area where this rock shelf is, there appears to be an open cavern entrance right underneath this shelf. As Frumpkin ducks down and looks, you can see another one of the shine; there's a few of them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, fuck.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Frumpkin will piss out some ink and use a bonus action to dash back towards the group.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Frumpkin quickly retracts and finds his way to the rest of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did you see?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I tell him to come back and come out and say: There's a lot of things just ahead of us over the ridge.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do you mean, things?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Flashing, moving things, things that are alive.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: More than one, I think.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: More than one?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's still in the direction of the orb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or something large with many parts, but I could not tell too well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What was the glimmer?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I could not tell you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He didn't see a lot, did he?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, it's murky down here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who wants to take a look?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't you--?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's all just run forward and charge over the ridge.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How about this? Here's an idea. Go back to the merrow that we killed, get one of their tridents or whatever, Disguise Self like you're one of them, and then you can just swim in like you're a bad fish.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I don't think that's a--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it going to work?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How do you know that the merrow are friends with these people?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're not people.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, this group of angry things that might want to kill us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think they're going to be nervous that Fjord doesn't speak the language and is moving at half-- plus he swims funny.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am reaffixing Frumpkin to my face.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He actually swims really well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not for a fish person, though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's keep moving in, yes? There's nothing gained by staying up here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's keep on going.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But maybe--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Someone say it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As we approach this area that he's described to us, this white coral, you said it was in a valley, like a dip?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: At the top of where the valley is, is there any cover that we might be able to get up behind and then peek down into said valley, like boulders?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're moving through this area, there are clumps of seaweed that rise up hundreds of feet out of view. The base of it is pretty thick and you could try and move through that. That's what you are using to stealth as you come through, darting from section to section of this heavy underwater vegetation.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we cut some of the seaweed and hold it in front of us so that when we move it just looks like seaweed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kind of into it, actually.

lines.name: MATT, TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll jump on that train, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to itch like a motherfucker in the morning.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's okay. We're at the bottom of the ocean. A lot's going to itch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You slowly farm sections of seaweed and begin to shift your way forward, using it as a screen. The shifting tendrils slowly shimmy along in the direction of this coral cluster.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we ribbon dance a little bit as we go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just you two, right? Is this the group?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, all of us are doing it. Whoever wants to be stealthy and be a brilliant person, I guess.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just wrap some seaweed around Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who's at the front of this journey? Maintaining a similar position?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will be.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Perception check, and one other person if they wish to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't have--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah, he doesn't have darkvision.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, I can try--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, go. Yeah, you're leading the pack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of you guys roll perception.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you both come up to the edge of where the sandbank here seems to slightly descend in a series of soft steps before that small ravine carves down and that large chunk of rock stands there, you can see the cavern. You see once again that shifting. It's like a wave of light passes over. You can see it's coins. A bunch of light passes over coins that are scattered amongst the floor of the entrance of this tunnel.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, there's an entrance to the tunnel, okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we see what made the light?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not from this distance.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Coins.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So the ground is littered with coins outside of this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You saw at the entrance a handful of coins that caught the light, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is Buttonbeard is real?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nott, did you think I was lying?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I thought it was just a legend.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm hurt. Our friendship has taken damage from this exchange.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's real?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like Santa Claus, you might have to go up and check for yourself. Tug on the beard, see if--

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: This is a terrible idea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But do it by yourself.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is literally exactly--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't do that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's drunk, don't tell her to do stupid things.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could go over and just take a look.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nope. That's how people die.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How much do you love buttons?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fjord. Remember when I said I would check you when you're being a dick?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, no, I do. Yeah. All right. Fine. We do it together.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I don't think we should go in this way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think we should go in this way either.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm open to suggestions.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It literally says, "Treasure is in their eyes. They swim for treasure in the lantern "light." This is a pot. This is a honeypot for sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we swim around and look for another entrance to this cavern?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't one of y'all have a copy of yourselves that you could send in a certain distance?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean I can only get it 120 feet away from me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It will also put it at alert even before we get there. You send it in and it sees this other Jester and then it is ready for a fight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could send an image of a fish or something in there and see what happens, or some other type of creature.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, if it's a trap that can be sprung by something going in, maybe fish or maybe a humanoid, that would probably be good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we don't want it to know we're here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, they're going to know really quick, right? We're not going to make it in silently, right? I mean, this is clearly a honeypot, it's a trap. Might as well spring the trap.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, we could send in an image of a fish and see, but an image of a fish-- it's not movement of water, it's not the same.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're on this ridge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're maybe about, since you stopped at that edge before it begins to descend over, you're about 60 or so feet from this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do we see to the sides and-- so there's a cavern straight ahead facing towards us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Ahead and facing towards you guys with a large shelf that protrudes over it that puts it mostly in shadow, and the coral's built all around that. If you wanted to try and move around it you could, but it's about 200 or so feet across.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is my point. I think we quietly go around and get on top of the house and throw whatever the bait is in front and then we're back here for whatever comes out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's very smart.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that's a very reasonable plan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I agree. Let's do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then I can send Jester down there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mm-hmm, let's do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Make it so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys swim across towards the top? All right. You paddle up as a group, up--

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: Around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, around?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Around, not over top.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Take our time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys move slowly around, still moving stealthily, to the edges. Then you move up and over? What are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Around the sides of the map instead of just across.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sitting on top of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get up and slowly descend towards where the coral is. Your feet find the edges. Some of it is brittle and as your foot touches, it snaps and parts of it crumble at the very edges, but nothing that you feel will alert your presence necessarily.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Conserve the reef you guys, be responsible divers.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's so sad. Don't drop anchors. Anyway, continue.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you move up to the edge of the shelf, and you glance over the edge, you see the shadow entrance of the cavern before you. Once again that shimmer finds its way across a dozen or more coins that are visible, partially embedded in the muck and sand there at the foot of this cavern entrance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I try to send my duplicate down?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One question. This is definitely coral that we are sitting on top of, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's bits of coral. When you step out towards that shelf, the coral recedes and now it's a protruding large slab of stone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It is a protruding large slab of stone and not a big-ass mouth or anything like that, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, come on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's always a big-ass mouth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm looking at it. (raspberry) 11.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You just turned 12 years old.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's been a day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks to be stone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (exaggerated sighing) I'm putting tinfoil on my windows now, I'm fucking done.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, DM.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, DM. I think we send Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to create my duplicate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you use Channel Divinity once and you send your duplicate to swim down--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to swim down and I'm going to have her skip around and see the coins and be like-- and go over and act like she's going to try to get the coins.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You watch as the illusory Jester goes and performs a great stock video of excited lucky person, performing the reaction silently.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can it please be the infomercials where she has trouble collecting the coins?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Have you ever--?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't you hate it when--?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can't hold shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30 seconds pass of Jester doing the song and dance down there. No reaction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit. It might need actual vibrations or--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, there's nothing down there. I'll jump down there and join Jester.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Fjord dives off the side and swims down towards the entrance to this cavern. As you approach you can see the coins plainly in front of you. Do you land at the entrance?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Your feet find soft footfall on the sediment that has gathered there, knocking up a little bit of it for a minute before it all eventually settles once more. Looking inside, make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really good on these today. Three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shitty rolls at this table.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance inside; there's no source of the light that you keep seeing flashing by. You look down and there's no glittering anymore. There's no traveling light beam, but the coins are there in front of you. Looking up into the cavern, it continues in and seems to descend and open up into a chamber just where your darkvision ends.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Looks fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It seems to be running up the walls of the interior, as well as a section of it sitting in the center of the main chamber. It's a different color than the seaweed that you've been using to get here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll look up where everybody is and I'm like--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think maybe we just don't take the coins, maybe.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, maybe no one touches the treasure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (distressed noises)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nott, don't. I'm going to hold onto Nott as we jump down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Buttonbeard knows who touches his treasure and who doesn't.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that part of the legend?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. There's more treasure inside if you make it past the initial treasure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I believe you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm already down here, so I'll summon the falchion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With a slight displacement and popping sound of the water making room for the falchion as it emerges, it hums slightly in your grasp, being this deep in the ocean.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll hold it up. Is the eye doing anything other than casting that glowing light?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, but it is casting it and it is very present. There is a faint hint of eagerness brimming from within you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Y'all do something before I get reckless.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: MARiSHA: I'm going to swim and try not to touch the ocean floor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you stay up above. All of you make your way towards the entrance to this cavern.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to send the duplicate out in front of us; I've still got 30 seconds left of it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to keep an eye on our rear.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The minute I hear things start, I'm going to cast some light on the walls so I can see shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that will be Caleb at the back, Jester and Fjord towards the front, everyone else staying in the center.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jester said she was holding me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I am holding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys slowly begin to make your way into the tunnel--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I let go of Nott as soon as we're into the tunnel, away from the coins.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you release Nott into the water, you guys begin to take your first steps into the interior of the cavern. We're going to take a break.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I knew it was coming, it just--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My back's sweating!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll be back here in a minute to see what this strange chamber seems to hold.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I need to re-listen to the tale of Dashilla. I need to go find that awesome ukulele version those girls did.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The light stopped doing this across the gold, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, once you stood there, the gold was seemingly inert.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll be back here in a few minutes. Before we hop over, we do have the giveaway. Our fine friends at Wyrmwood are giving away this amazing wenge dice vault. "Wenj"? How do you pronounce it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "When-gay."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "When-gay," thank you. I always mess that up, I don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We had this discussion today.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is awesome, two-tone on each side, dice vault for giveaway. It is the wenge dice vault with tiger maple inlay, which is what this is called-- looks awesome-- and a copy of your own Pumat t-shirt is in the giveaway as well!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The one that you wore, Matt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I hope not, you don't want that. You really don't want that. This will be given away to somebody at the end of the break. To enter, go ahead and head over to the Critical Role Twitch chat at twitch.tv/criticalrole during the break and enter the word intro. I-N-T-R-O. Enter it once; more than that, you'll be disqualified, unfortunately, and once again this is only viable for people in the U.S. and Canada, excluding Quebec.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, Quebec.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well played, and welcome back everybody! Before we get started, the winner of our fantastic giveaway with the Pumat shirt and this awesome dice vault from our friends at Wyrmwood is QuickAscension. QuickAscension, congratulations; we'll get this out to you ASAP.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: QuickAscension!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: QuickAscen-- no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We play D&D.

lines.name: TRAVIS, SAM
lines.text: We play Dungeons & Dragons!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's all the show is now. That's the rest of the campaign.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That will break me. As we left off, you all were beginning to make your way into this series of-- there's this whole strange entrance to this cavern.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's just a cave, you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you step in the inside, it descends a bit, like makeshift natural paths, like stairs or grades that curve around and drop into the central chamber where you see it goes in two different directions, to the right and left. In the middle, there's a large cluster of this purplish-maroon seaweed. The outside of the leaves have a teal-ish blue color. It wraps up against the walls as well. As you swim through and move, the still water shifts with your movement; you can see some of it sway and move with your movement.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh fucking Jesus, our stealth is going to be balls here. What does the floor look like? Sand, silt, coins?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking down, make an investigation check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can't you just tell me?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jesus, Travis!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, nine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The hell is wrong with us tonight?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's wrong with you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I used it up last week!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Apparently. Well, if there was a week to use it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You sift your hand through underneath and feel. You find an errant copper piece left there that comes up into your fingers. The rest of it appears to be general sand and soft silt that clouds a bit around your fingers as you pull your hand up from mucking around in it. It settles fairly quickly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want to keep your duplicate in front of us, or is it gone?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It only lasts for a minute, but yes, I can keep her there as long as she lasts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right about now, she vanishes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's gone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're in the room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I may be blind, other than what I can see, but if I hit Detect Magic, something's going to light up in my--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's certainly possible.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. I'm just saying, if there was something, I feel like I would know that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could make an image of something ahead of us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to cast Detect Magic? Why'd I put a question mark at the end of that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Detect Magic?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to cast Detect Magic really quickly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Nothing ahead of you seems to give a magical aura; behind you, ever so faintly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The magical aura's coming from the mouth of the cave?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's coming from the mouth of the cave, towards the top.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Towards the top?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh! It's where the light's being projected from, I imagine. But nothing in the room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing in the room-- and you do know, glancing at that magical aura coming from the entranceway, it is illusory in nature.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would also be able to sense something magic through it that's buried up to three feet down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. I'm not getting any other pings in here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just that weird thing up front, nothing else.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will cast Silent Image and project a small dwarf man, about 60 feet in front of us, with a beard made out of buttons and a pirate hat cocked to one side, and he's walking all prim and proper, like he owns the place. He's got a patch on his eye that's made out of a button! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Old Buttonbeard's legend lives on! As Buttonbeard trounces around the central chamber, no reaction.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to ask the kelp: Hey guys, this feels a little ominous. You'd let me know if there was something untoward happening around here, right? Right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, seaweed, technically. Kelp is a little more shallow-based, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you, that is fair.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What on earth are we doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just hold on, octopus-head.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Apparently, kelp is shallow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is totally normal.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mine is functional!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (sings circus tune)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're all still standing in the entranceway as you come down into this central chamber. It's about 35, 40 feet from side to side and then it branches off to the right and left ahead of you--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which way are we going?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is that central cluster of seaweed that is coming up and going against the ceiling and you can see on the walls, it's still riding along the edges.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going to the right.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm proud of you for that. Hopefully that'll be the first good roll you've made tonight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you hear anything from your talk?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Besides, it's polite.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we move towards the fork?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You move towards the fork. The chamber itself is oval-like, but in the center of the chamber is where there's a mass of the seaweed, so you'd have to curve around it to get to either exit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are there any pebbles on the ground or anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are some wayward stones that you could probably--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This seaweed in the middle of the chamber, have we seen anything like this before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, all the seaweed in this chamber is a different color than what you've seen when you came in. Everything else had a greenish-blue tint to it, this has a deep maroon-purple with a blue outline across the exterior of each little thread of leaf.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What was the color of the fruit in the fucking temple? Weren't they like--?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think they were yellow. I pictured them like mangoes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they were mango-esque.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They were mango-esque.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But the inside was purplish and red, right? Well, because it was obviously being fed blood.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was, it was bloody.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sorry, trying to make a connection where there might not be one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I was with you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, no deal, okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I toss one of the pebbles at a cluster of--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It hits it, moves with the impact with the faint bit that gets hit. There's no reaction.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did we want to separate and go around and meet on the other side?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if there's something in the middle of the cluster? Can we use a stick or something? You want to use your staff and push the cluster?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I literally can't see anything right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, there's a cluster of kelp in the middle of the room here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Things tend to live.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anybody have any objections to going to the right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, let's just do it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fuck it, right? We're all going to die down here anyway, it doesn't matter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't you think there might be something in the middle of all the kelp though?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There might be, but we'll keep an eye on it as we move around to the right; I just have a very strong feeling about going to the right. It's based off of, really, gut-- I'm right handed, so we're going to go to the right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we see bubbles in the water at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ten. No! That's a nine, so that is a 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, just you, okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would ask permission before putting a light in the kelp to see if there's anything in there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No bubbles. There's no aeration of the interior here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we see a top to this chamber?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glancing up, yeah, you can see where the seaweed gathers and bunches up towards meeting it from the walls in the center of the chamber. It's maybe 15 feet above you. It's not terribly tall.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: When was the-- yeah, all right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, can we start moving to the right? Will we be able to see a clear divide between the two left and right passages?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see the two sides, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a divide that goes from ceiling to floor, right? It's not some fucking uvula that's hanging right there, waiting to dangle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like it's a cavern.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. You know what I'm saying?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm with you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am not. What are we doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to the right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's go to the right, then.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey Nott, stab the floor really fast.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Stab the floor with your dagger.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shortsword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It goes a few inches into the soft floor of the chamber before it hits stone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's been pacified.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you. We'll continue to the right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You take your first step and you watch something drift across the entrance from wall to wall. Some faint glowing figure-- and is gone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (yelling) I don't like it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shut up! Oh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's in my head!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did it trip my Detect Magic sense at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not magic sense, no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it undead, or is it a ghost?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispering) It's Dashilla!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to do another detect undead really quickly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Give me the specifications on that one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. Eyes of The Grave. As an action you know the location of any undead within 60 feet of you that isn't behind total cover and isn't protected from divination magic until the end of your next turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, got you. How long does it last?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Six seconds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You definitely get an undead sense from whatever this figure is, and then it merges with the wall and is gone. It appeared to be loosely humanoid in the brief glimpse you saw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have undead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a ghost ship!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it going to be your crew?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, we're not on your ship anymore.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now we're in the mouth of a beast! Ducey, what's going on, brother?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know, I'm literally blind. I want to light this--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you feeling scared down here now all of a sudden?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just to start, I'm going to throw some light into the center of the kelp.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are a handful of what might have been human remains tangled in that same seaweed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think this thing is carnivorous.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The seaweed?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) under the sea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (singing) Doo doo, ba doo.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we leave?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we should leave.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know what, who really needs the sphere? Should we just go back to the boat? No? I didn't mean it either. All right, we move forward.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't think anyone should touch the seaweed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, lights off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, lights off?! Why lights off?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The light vanishes once more and darkness comes to the chamber.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That shit's going to reach out. I don't know how to stop it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you guys continue to the right chamber?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm holding my hands up like this in case anything reaches for me. And my axe in my hand, too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've still got a few minutes of Detect Magic, so if anything--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Understood. Fjord? You just have this gentle chill on the back of your head, like something frozen just caressed the back of your skull and is gone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Gentle chill, like a Jack Johnson song.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't do this to me! Everyone else at this table is less susceptible to shit like that! Don't do it to me, okay! I don't need this right now! Cool, no problem.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just don't make it like Ring girl, okay? Or like The Grudge.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, stop, why would you want to put it out there?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (shushing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you walk through, the edges of the seaweed begin to drift forward, seemingly drawn in by the warmth of your bodies.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, it's drawing towards us, or it's pulling in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's pulling in. There's the central section and the wall. As you begin to move through, it begins to slowly pull in to close in towards you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we freeze it? Can we cast cold on it or something?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we move fast?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Moving quickly through, it's not moving rapidly. As soon as you see this, you begin to dart through. The only person who would be in danger is the very end. Caleb, since you're at the back, I need you to make a dexterity saving throw for me. Because as all of you start darting through and making your way, they're drifting and tangling in closer together.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you move forward, you feel a bit of it touch your shoulder, and then it wraps around and pulls you against the wall. You guys hear this (slamming) behind. There's a shift of water. You watch Caleb get yanked towards the right side of the chamber. It's currently (sucking). The seaweed begins to snake its way around. Caleb, you take five points of poison damage and are grappled.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I send two shots of Eldritch Blast at the stuff around it, the kelp?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, I'll say two attacks with disadvantage because you're having to aim them to try to keep around him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to cast Light really quickly, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, the light fills the space.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: First one's a 19 and not a natural 20, but a 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, yeah. Both hit, go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: B-b-blast!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 12 and--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eldritch B-b-blast!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 26 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, each side-- Both blasts of Eldritch Blast impact the sides of the cavern wall with a dull (thud). The clusters of seaweed that currently wrap around Caleb are torn to the point where you have enough strength to pull yourself free, breaking the grapple. You shrug them off of you. As you're touching with your fingers, your fingers spike with pain. No additional poison damage, necessarily, but you know staying would continue to do so.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm poisoned?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are not poisoned. You just took poison damage. You manage to pull it away and catch up with the rest of the crew. You guys are heading towards the right chamber, which begins to rise up a bit before leveling off about 15 feet above and about 20 feet ahead of you. The walls are still covered in this seaweed in chunks. About every five or so feet, you see another cluster, and they're a bit scattered around the interior. A large portion of this whole chamber network seems to be housing this same type of plant.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going to move fast, and I'm going to keep Eldritch Blast charged, and if anything starts to reach closer than other areas of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're good at this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to keep Sacred Flame prepped as well, to release it then if anything gets attacked.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're readying the spell?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. It's just a cantrip.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so you're fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Six!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, well, get rid of it then!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I drink out of that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Jester, you feel this-- like a burst of brain freeze for a second-- like something cold tickles the inside of your head. And it's gone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is weird.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What happened?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It felt like I drank a Slurpee or something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus, you see something shadowy shift long down the hall up and above that barely catches your attention before it's gone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I even have to bother, or do I know what that is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't. It's not the same as before.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's something different?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is just a movement in dark shadow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, then I'm going to do the Eyes of the Grave one more time the minute I see it. There's something else down here too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Something else? Oh, great.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm feeling a little weary. Does anyone want to help me out a little bit?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Someone heal Caleb.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're going to take it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, teamwork.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha will--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yasha can--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, she has an ability.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you want to save your stuff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, let's have Yasha--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha will heal Caleb for seven hit points using Healing Hands.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thanks, Ashley.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What happened just now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seven points. Healing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did you take your 17 earlier also?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: From Prayer of Healing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I didn't know that was for me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was for everybody.

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you need the seven?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can't do the math right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then I'm good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so Yasha holds onto that, then.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everyone was.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought that was for one person.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did a group thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So continuing on?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. There's something up ahead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to look for traps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Go ahead and make a perception check to see if you notice anything strange about the interior.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 18 and a five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Looking about the area, it looks like a natural cavern. You don't see much that would catch-- any some sort of dissembled or trap mechanism with a trigger.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're fine. Come on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can light it up in here if we want. Or do we want to?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They know we're here now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Light it up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. I'm going to put the string of globules up the passage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's at least unrestrict Caduceus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The globules appear like lights coming on segmented down a long hallway. As the final one glows, right behind it, you see the figure of a man looking at you, white and pale, who then steps back into the wall and vanishes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! This is really terrible!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (stammering) Into the wall?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He was a ghost!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: While we're looking at that, I'll take the seaweed that we used as camouflage before. You know the thing where you put an orange on your mouth? I'm going to do that with seaweed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eww.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to look up at Fjord and be like: It's already got me! Ah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm hideous. No, he's right. I'm hideous.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. That's the worst thing I've ever heard or seen. Did I recognize the face?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Because you're the closest up there, since you're helming it in with darkvision-- Darkvision wouldn't matter so much in this instance. But the figure you saw looked to be male wearing loose fitting clothing, sunken eyes with no actual eyes inside the sockets, pale with a faint ghostly glow about their visage. A line of rope wrapped around one arm. Multiple loops. It just stared at you before stepping back into the wall and vanishing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We go forward, right? Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you really want this? Do you really want this orb though?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's still in this direction, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (nervous) I don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: At least so far they are not harassing us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah that's true. More the plants than anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did he look menacing-- the guy? Did he just look like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No expression. Just blank and cold. Absent of any real emotion before it dissipated.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, we'll keep going forward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Continuing down this path, you climb or swim up the brief 15-foot incline to get to the next tunnel path where the orbs were spread out to continue. You move through and the elements of seaweed that were still in there are shifting from the water displacement ever so slightly. As you move through, same order you guys are going through?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That being the case, as you push through I need Caleb once again to make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Expeditious Retreat! As a reaction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go for it. I'll let you do that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You cast Expeditious Retreat. You manage to dart forward and out of the grasping hands of the seaweed through the use of your spell. You catch up, now darting forward through everybody next to Jester and Fjord.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you want to be in the middle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whatever I've got ten minutes of zip, baby! Let's go forward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. There. We are moving forward in that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just for fun, I'm going to tap Resistance on you. Well I'm just going to give you-- if anything happens in the next minute you can add a d4 to any saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you continue and curve around the edge?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You come around the corner and look. You guys are at the front. I need Jester and Fjord to make-- since you have the globes, you can move the globes ahead if you want to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll say that they're 20 feet ahead of us and 20 feet behind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you do not have disadvantage on your perception checks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take a perception check, then.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's the same thing you rolled last time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't understand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because they're the ones at the front, they get to do this first.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you're safer in the middle. What did you get?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you turn around the corner and look, the path continues for another 20 or so feet in this tunnel before it descends into a much larger chamber. The seaweed gets thicker towards the mouth of this chamber. From the little bit of glowing orbs that begin to extend over that edge that goes into it, what little bit of light hits bits of gold coins scattered all throughout the floor of that next chamber.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't touch them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we dare steal a glance at the seaweed that's around? Are there also strips of cloth and bone and body?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These in the walls only have a few scattered pieces of parts. No full bodies here in the hallway.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Less people made it this far.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, as you're coming around that corner and people are looking off to the side, you glance over your shoulder and see for a split second an older man with a curled and scraggly beard that goes down to about mid-chest. The eyes are missing. You see vacant, dark sockets. The jaw is slack-jawed and open as it looks towards you. I need you to make a charisma saving throw, please.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh fuck. Not what I'm great at. Don't fuck me, Gil. 12. Not good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It leans in towards you and-- not yet. It leans in towards you and you feel this cold sensation over your whole body. Your muscles lock in place and your consciousness goes dark. Out of the corner of your eye you see some sort of ghostly movement. You look over and see Beau rest into a standing position on her back foot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to Turn Undead really quickly, and then I'm going to go over and deal with you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the DC on that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The DC on Turn Undead is-- let me hit my--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As she's resting on her back foot, her eyes are open?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eyes are open, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a wisdom saving throw? It's right here so it's-- why is it not saying these things?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know. Why doesn't yours have it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mine's weird. Wisdom saving throw. Oh, so is that my--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whatever your spell DC is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16. No, fails by one. It's a 14 plus one, 15.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck off, ghost.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Being a specialist in undead and already preparing for the presence here, you glance out of the corner of your eye just in time to see the essence of this spiritual form drift into Beau's body. As you watch that moment of consciousness fade from her face, as the presence of Beau goes cold and whatever was in this tunnel begins to come to the forefront, you take your staff and slam it into the ground. This wave of light energy emerges. It impacts all of you and the water gets suddenly warm around you. As it blows past Beau, you see strands of hair get blown back and with that, that same ghostly old man body jettisons out the back of her and drags down the hallway into darkness and disappears.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not cool, man. Not cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What just happened?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's back?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Was I Traci again?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are ghosts going to be trying to take over our minds?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Caduceus, did you just do that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He was creepy, man. Come on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you had ghosts try to take you over before?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa. Has it ever worked?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not that I know of. I hope. I mean, would you know?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know. Do I know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have an essence after what just happened that something weird happened and you lost yourself.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a feeling that if these dead people invade our bodies, they're going to walk us into the walls. We should huddle together and keep a hand on each other. If one of us stops moving, stop that person. Okay? We need to move forward quickly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it worth cutting through some of this stuff?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I can use Sacred Flame on the ones in front of us and see if it will make it open in the opening?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can join you for that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Otherwise, we should move quickly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are having this conversation, you glance back in the tunnel where you came from where Caduceus had jettisoned that spirit back, and at the very edge of the light, you can see about 12 or so of these ghostly figures standing there, unmoving--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is really terrible.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's find what we're looking for and get out of here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Keep going!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With the hustle. I mean, on the hustle. On the quick march.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Pushing towards and following the orbs gliding forward, the mouth of this entranceway before it opens up is where it looks like two larger clusters on each side of this seaweed is through. You are what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sacred Flame-ing one of the clusters and he's going to Sacred Flame the other cluster.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you. It's been a long day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll damage. We'll see if it's enough to clear the way for a moment. You as well, Caduceus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Four radiant damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Damage?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's seven radiant damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The side on Caduceus' edge of the wall, you watch this blast of radiant energy emanate from the side of the wall and blow out the center part. Some of the seaweed get released and begins to scatter and float towards the top. Your side blasts, but it doesn't quite tear all the way through. You guys begin darting forward on the right side. Caleb, you're the first one there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Has it been over ten minutes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. You're still Expeditious Retreat?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, it lasts ten minutes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You dart inside the chamber ahead of everybody else. You're now in the center of this open chamber as you stop with the globes around you to take in the atmosphere. The rest of you are now having to catch up. Yasha needs to make a dexterity saving throw as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She gets advantage because she can see it, because of her Danger Sense.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, that's right. Natural 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, for Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She just-- actually no, she shoulder checks the seaweed and does not give a shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It works for Yasha.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (as Yasha) No problem.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about 50 to 60-foot diameter, continues in for about 80 or so feet, and the height goes to about 30 to 35 feet. All the walls here are covered in this seaweed. Make a perception check, two of you who are helming the view on this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm already in there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true. Yeah, you make one first.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, we'll take it. 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Glancing around, you can see areas where the seaweed is slowly shifting from the movement of Caleb's Expeditious Retreat. What was once still shifts, and you can see elements of the stone wall behind it. Your eyes barely make out a handful of small carvings in the wall. Small runic letters that are not in line, but at angle sporadically carved at places, but where the seaweed moves over and blocks it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does my Detect Magic-- which I think is just barely still up? I don't feel like this has been a ten-minute venture since that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I'd say you're pushing the edge on this one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not much longer, I know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say as you step into this chamber-- are you heading to the center of it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I'm just coming in and looking around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're standing at the mouth of this, just past the edge, you do not detect anything particularly magical. Then as you take your first step into the chamber, you see this. You almost run into it. In the middle of this chamber, there is a small two-foot pedestal and a disc, a stone disc about that wide and about two feet from edge to edge that is resting on it but at an angle. It looks old. It looks weathered and there appears to be a spiral of runes, two sets of them, that curve inward around each other before merging in the center with one singular sigil where they meet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are these arcane glyphs, or is this language?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are arcane glyphs. If you'd like to make an arcana check, if you want to take a moment to study.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is this our answer as to why this entire area eats ships?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could be.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is Uk'otoa here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. Well--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, sort of.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a temple?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's one of the three gates, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could be. There would need to be a spot for an orb.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is this what Vandren was going for?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's not what I saw in my dream.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The nature of it seems to be conjuration, and it seems to have a lot of the base runes that you've used to manipulate fire, you've used to manipulate earth. It's elemental in nature. You continue to look over it and get the sense that this is triggered by some sort of-- there's a physical material that needs to be brought to this table or brought as part of this ritual, and in doing so would conjure some sort of powerful elemental force.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did I pick up on the fact that Caduceus was looking at glyphs in the wall? Did I see those as well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you did not.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No? Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do feel this faint, cold, brushing sensation at the back of your skull.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What the fuck is that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think it's maybe time for another detect object. I'll take this one. I'm going to cast Locate Object.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You cast Locate Object, focusing on?

lines.name: TALIESIN
