lines.text: On the stone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You immediately realize that this is all things that have been salvaged and pulled from all the ships that have sunk and brought in. The floor you've been stepping on, that's been somewhat soft to the occasional crunch, you glance down and realize, is just bones. Just hundreds of human and humanoid bones that have all been gently dusted with the general sand and silt of the interior of this chamber.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It feels like everything is being sucked to this location.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 30-foot ceiling, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a throne, a chair of some kind that sits on the opposite side of the room. That's at a slight angle, resting against the stone, and you immediately know that's precisely where the object you seek resides, somewhere around or with that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's by the chair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's a chair?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How far away is it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, what do you mean chair?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb's the only one that's actually in the center of the chamber by this table, this thing that you've been studying.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where are the ghosts? They're just hanging out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance over your shoulder?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not moving. Just looking at you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (distressed yell)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're being herded. That's great.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What you told me was that studying this thing, it seems to require elements to set it in motion? How did you describe it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're getting closer, because the arcana is not an immediate thing, it's a slow process of study. There's a heavy elemental conjuring that this is capable of doing. It's very old, primal magic. Looking at the stone, the stains, and the interior of these ruins, there is distinctly a dark brown tint to elements of this table.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Some might say amber?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you scrape some of it with your fingernail, it flakes off. It has a consistency you're familiar with, that of a coagulated blood.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus, as you're looking over towards the throne, you look up and about ten feet above the throne, standing up in the seaweed holding onto the clusters of it, you see a female humanoid form mostly in shadow, hair down over the front of the face, one yellow eye peeking through on this side, and one half-open yellow eye glancing through, up against the wall.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's right above the throne.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The song. Her hungry eye. It's in her fucking head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as she scrambles across the side of the wall, behind the seaweed, and is gone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's gone?

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA, TRAVIS
lines.text: (yelling) No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (yelling)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is The Ring!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god! We're fighting The Grudge. I'll throw up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 19! Plus one, so that's 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Woo! I got 20 as well!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh fuck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just two clerics at 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This sucks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit. What?!

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two map night!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh fuck.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck. This is so much worse than I was imagining.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where are we?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's the throne over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is the entrance.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, look! We picked the right way to go!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you did.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What was in the other ones?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: An encounter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tell me whereabouts you were placed around the base.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck, that's tiny.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like I would still be on the stairs because I was looking back at the ghosts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true. I'll put you and Caduceus kind of up towards the top, there. You guys are back here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'd have been near Fjord, probably.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so you'll be up here with the rest of them. The shape you saw up in this direction before it vanished.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's just a little thing!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So is Nott the Brave.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why would you even say that to the DM? You know how much shit he has back there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, it's just one person.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stop it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Didn't look like she even had any weapons!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you ever see Cabin in the Woods? Do you know how bad this is going to get?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dashilla rolled really good initiative. So, who's up first? 25 to 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Beau, Jester, and Cad both have 20s?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, Beau had 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. 20 to 15.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I had a 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord at a 16. 15 to ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott. Ten to five.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha had a seven.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god. Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm assuming the ten minutes for Expeditious is gone from studying the table?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, I'd say it took you two or three minutes to study, so Expeditious is still on the table.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A minute or two left. Okay. Great, I'll take it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beginning of this round. The only person that's seen this entity is Caduceus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't see them anymore?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. They seem to have shifted into this thick forest of seaweed that tends to wrap around all the walls of this chamber. Beau, you're up first.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't see anything. I look around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can use your action to try and perceive if you want to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go: Caduceus! Then I look around and see if I see anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you use the search action. Roll a perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight? Unfortunately, no. You look around the vicinity and glancing up around, and you see movement from the water that's being disturbed, but no sight of any particular entity.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I move towards Caleb and kind of bodyguard him. I am going to take the Patient Defense. Yeah, that works. I'm going to take the Patient Defense.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Bonus action to Patient Defense.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Action, yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That finishes Beau's turn. Caduceus and Jester, you guys can decide which of you goes first.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was just going to cast Bless. Entirely up to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to cast Bless on myself--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is Bless concentration?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bless is concentration. So, I'm casting Bless on myself, on Caleb, and on Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you guys get to add a d4 to your attack rolls and saving throws.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Holy shit. Okay. (belch) Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Spiritual Guardians. Oh, sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Also, I'm going to back up into the wall so I can keep an eye down that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not too close to the wall because of the seaweed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, no. See that little thing, that little node behind me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, so I can't be attacked from behind, but also I can keep an eye on--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you go against the wall?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As long as there's no seaweed there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's seaweed there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All the walls are coated in this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then I'm going to take a step or two down to scatter us a little bit more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Down this way?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I know, it's a little weird.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, I'll put you there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you. Yeah, anyway, I know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes your turn, Jester. Okay, Jester, you're casting Spiritual Guardians?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. I'm going to step a couple steps toward Fjord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There alongside him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Down to the-- yeah, okay. Then, yes, I'm going to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, where do you want to go? If you want to move--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I wanted to not be quite in a line with everybody else. I was going to be on the steps, if that's possible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Here? Yeah, we'll make it work. There, sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You'll know I'm there. Yeah, sure. I go like this. They're the little spiritual unicorns, but they're seahorses because we're underwater.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cute!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now all these little glowing pink seahorses now surround you. 15-foot, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, 15 feet around me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Got it, okay. You have that up. You are also now concentrating on Spiritual Guardians. That finishes Jester's turn there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's so cute.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to-- what did you guys both roll initiative on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so concurrent with your turn, lair action.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: Lair action!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Matt, this isn't a dragon. They don't get lair actions.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you all stand here, rising out of the ground, dozens of spirits begin to drift up, of various drowned sailors and scavengers, out of the ground and up toward the ceiling. I need everybody inside to make a wisdom saving throw, please.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you have the d4, you can use the d4.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, right, okay. Thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, did you give a d4 to everybody?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ha!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha rolled a five. Fjord rolled a 16.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Son of a bitch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord, you're fine. Yasha is frightened of Dashilla until the end of the round. Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Frightened.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You succeed. You manage to resist the fear effect.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope, Nott's immune to fear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're like, come at me, spirits!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I never knew there was anything good about the drunk!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It hasn't come into play!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott becomes Nott the Brave when she's drunk.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Amazing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So unaffected. Spirits, whatever!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fuck you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've been braving the ocean for half a day.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuck you! Come at me, you sea hag!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You manage to resist it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 28. The fuck is this shit? Who the fuck are you people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the spirits rise, this haunting, wailing sound reverberates in the chamber. Both Caleb and Yasha, their eyes go wide, and their breathing begins to increase. You guys are frightened of Dashilla to the end of the turn. Now it comes to Dashilla's turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can take care of that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Suddenly, tearing through the seaweed on the upper wall, you see this figure emerge now. This pale, aqua-green skin that's bulbous and strangely proportioned. These long, clawed hands. As the hair pulls back, you can see, where would be a humanoid face instead are these protracted, almost anglerfish-type teeth that come out of the front, with no nose, and the yellow eyes gleaming from underneath. She's going to look straight down at you, Caleb.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you to make a wisdom saving throw for me, please.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Another one? Oh, good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My bodyguarding doesn't do shit. Stop looking at him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural one? As she looks, she's still up in the air, swimming, looking at you. Mouth opens, and you feel the deepest, most horrifying fear well up inside you. Your heart stops, and you drop to zero hit points.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my fucking god!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys watch Caleb go (creaking) and start drifting there, unconscious.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dashilla, now hovering in the space, is going to move over. She moves over to the side of the wall here, still visible, now jumping and using and holding onto the seaweed like it's a tether. All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Really could have used that periapt right about now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The periapt. That ends her turn. Fjord, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is she visible?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's visible. She's up on the wall on this side.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I got this. I've got him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Aside from Fjord, you're all half speed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, the lights are out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I still have my light.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And his sword? Is his sword out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The sword does give a faint bit of light.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And my axe!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll use my speed to close to the pedestal, between the pedestal and Dashilla.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but I'll stop short of her. I will use a bonus action to cast Hex on her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She is hexed. You have already used your--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hexblade's Curse, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As she's holding up there, looking down at you, the murkiness of the nearby waters in the movement begins to form around her and almost try and claw at her throat, like the shadows themselves are trying to pull at her clavicle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will gather two Eldritch Blasts in my hands and fire them both at her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll two attacks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With extra d4s on both.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, thank you. One is a natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it is!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The other is a 17 plus four for a 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both hit. You don't even need the d4s on that. Roll damage on the critical first.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I roll an extra d6 for the Hex, okay. So the critical first. 1d10 plus four. That's a one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So two, but roll the d6, which is also doubled.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So 12, so that's 14 plus your--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plus four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's 18 points of damage on that one. And damage for the second one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is a nine plus four, 13. Five, 18 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as she's up there, as the Hex constrains around her, both Eldritch Blasts hit. From both blasts, there's these dark scar marks on the upper torso and one off the shoulder where they impact. The head curls up and (creaking) back in your direction. The eyes seem to bulge angrily toward you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Uh-huh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does that end your turn?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, it does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. At the end of your turn, she's going to use one of her legendary actions to use Forced Vision. At some point during this adventure, as she was trailing you throughout the cavern and watching from a distance, she ensorceled a number of your members of the party, you being one of them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was the cold thingies.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Was she invisible?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She was hiding through all the seaweed, and no one was rolling high enough perception to see her. You saw her move once because she didn't roll high enough stealth on that one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What the fuck is about to happen?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And this is Forced Vision?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. You are not immediately in melee with anybody, but she's going to force you to move. You glance. All of a sudden you see her out of the corner of your eye. She's not there anymore. She's off there. You rush in her direction after her, compelled to move over this side right up against the wall, between the wall and Beau. You get there, and she's gone. You look back, and she never left. You shake your head for a second. That's one legendary action done. Next turn is Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will move to the left, my left, near that pillar thing, yeah, and bonus action hide behind it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You move over there. So bonus action, hide.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit, not great. 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 hits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, 16, that's the hide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry, that's right. Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know if that hides me enough. Is that--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know. You'll find out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. And I will attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So you dart from behind and fire.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I shoot at a 25 or something like that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That indeed hits. And she didn't roll very well for perception, so you do get sneak attack on this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right! Yeah. Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that's good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 21 plus five is--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (singing) 26

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Plus Fury of the Small is another seven, right? Is that that works now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, 33.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So darting from the side and letting the bubbles go by. She is within 30 feet of you, so you do not have the disadvantage. It catches her in the chest, and her hands go forward and she leans out of the seaweed for a second to pull it out and let it fall as it slowly begins to drift down, sinking into the chamber before reaching back up into the seaweed and holding on to it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is not sanitary.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does she take poison damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. She is immune to the effect of the seaweed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That makes a little sense.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Unfortunate. Unfortunate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, is that your turn?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's my turn. I've done everything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha is frightened.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She will rage with her bonus action and no longer be frightened or charmed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She can do that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Doesn't rage break--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nah. I think that's a thing that berserkers got.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll double check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It might have been. Might have been some old shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah that's mindless rage. It's sixth level path of the berserker. It's a little Grog bleeding in there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sorry. Old shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where's Caleb?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb is over there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can she...?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If she stays within 15 feet of me then she's-- anyone within 15 feet of me is protected by my unicorn dragons.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: From what? From Scary Face?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: From being attacked physically.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: From being attacked. They get attacked if they get near you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where is Jester standing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester's right here. She's technically up on the stair right there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay I got you. Can Yasha use her 20 feet to move to Caleb?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say, for the purposes of ease there, Jester is up on that stair there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 20 feet to move to Caleb, which shouldn't be any closer to Dashilla.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. Up on top of this platform or off to the side?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's a platform?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a little raised section in the center there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure. Platform sounds good. And she will use her handy heal thing to pump seven points of healing into Caleb.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did she get tapped in the head by the way? Since we are running her?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha didn't. Not that I remember.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did, Fjord did, and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb did.

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Caleb did.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So Caleb gets six hit points as an action, healing hands.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On top of seven, or six total?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seven total.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Seven total. So I got that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does that bring him back to consciousness?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes it does.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Just making sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're back to consciousness. You're at seven hit points.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But Expeditious Retreat is gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is Mage Armor gone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. You're still frightened until the end of the turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can she use a bonus action to rage, even though she's frightened?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know it might fall if she doesn't attack anything or isn't attacked.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay let's do it anyway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so she goes into a rage?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And that's her turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right that ends Yasha's go. At the end of Yasha's turn it's going to use another legendary action to use Forced Vision on you, Fjord. I need you to go ahead and make a melee attack against Beau, as you glance around and suddenly she's right there in front of you. And you take your falchion, swing out to try and take her out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Has disadvantage, because I have Patient Defense.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. So you have disadvantage on the strike.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, that's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you do have plus d4s to each of the hits because of Bless.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shitballs. That's at two plus eight is ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus a d4.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plus a d4 is--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He misses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What the hell?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dick!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm like, I don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (confused noises)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are conscious, prone, floating, sinking towards the ground as you come to consciousness as Yasha grabs and jolts you awake.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If I crouch behind the table from where Dashilla is, will I get half cover or something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you'd get half cover. Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. So I am going to do that and then I am going to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Getting up from prone?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would like to stay semi-crouched to try and get some cover from that thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can get cover.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you. And I pull a twisted blackened twig out and point it at her and cast Witch Bolt at fourth level.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's cool.

lines.name: MATT, LAURA
lines.text: At fourth level!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a fuck ton of d10s?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's 4d12.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a ranged spell attack, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. So you have to roll a d20, add your spell attack modifier.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Plus the Bless?

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, technically, because he was concentrating.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Spell attack is 13, plus the Bless is a d4?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's just four, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, it's a d4.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a d4. So, 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Her armor class is 15. I'm so sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Blast it. Gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You release the Witch Bolt and as it fires out and arcs, in a split-second moment the eyes go wide and she darts out of the way and it impacts the side of the stone wall. You watch as the seaweed she was clutching is burned and falls away for a second, and behind it, you see another one of those runes. Just sitting there in the chamber.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Them's the breaks. Them's the breaks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your turn. All right, back at the top. Beau, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Spellcasters suck!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, at the end of Caleb's turn...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many legendary actions does she have?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (background music)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, a fast swimmer! A regular Michael Phelps!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually she can move ten more feet, so right there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my God!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A 50-foot swim.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, what are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How many feet is she?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From you right now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. (counting)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30 feet from you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, okay, okay. I'm going to dart, I'm going to do, um...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Step of the Wind?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you. Thank you for knowing my abilities.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you jump off the ground and swim forward, cruising through the room, Step of the Wind you get one extra push and you land right next to where she is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (strained voice) I'm going to punch her with my fists! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just going to try and Keanu Reeves ghost-punch her. I don't know. Punching ghosts.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Was that a Matrix reference?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, uh, you know like the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is this at disadvantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, because you are underwater still.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's four. Yeah, probably not. 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first strike, as you come forward, this is the first time you get a really good look at the face of this terrible creature, and as soon as you come towards, the mouth opens up and you barely hold back from the punch and that just gives it enough time to shift out of the way and it just hits water.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One more. Okay! 22!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. You know now that 15 is the armor class.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I say, for the Hex, wisdom ability checks-- disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wisdom ability checks, got it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine? Nine points of damage. As the first one misses and pulls away, you're like, "Nope!" Whack! And then right across the jaw, (cracking sound). Cold and hard. There's a toughness to her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Boney.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Does that finish your turn, Beau?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Caduceus and Jester, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You want to go?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She did technically move around and would've passed through your 15-foot radius, by the way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll damage for your--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Spirit Guardians?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Spirit Guardians, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seahorses!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seahorse unicorns! Hold on, where's my other-- where the fuck are my d8s?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can use mine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (high pitched) Where'd all my d8s go!?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Here's one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's another one. 10, 13. Radiant damage!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sing-song) Mine rolled the best of the three dice!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you guys are players, I'm giving you the initiative just before the lair action hits, because you're all on 20. Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to step forward so I'm within 15 feet of her so they can try to attack her again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On her turn? All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bloop.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: An affected creature-- When you cast the spell-- What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically the creature's movement is halved when it moves through.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: An affected creature's is halved in the area, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It only barely skimmed the side, so it would have lost five foot of movement, so we'll say that Dashilla is there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. And when the creature enters the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there. So if I move towards it wouldn't it enter the area?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you're entering hers. She has to enter your area. However, at the start of her turn, it triggers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Then I'm going to move within 15 feet of her and then as a bonus action I'm going to cast Spiritual Weapon at 4th-level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ooh boy!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that the first time?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mmhmm. So that's a little spiritual lollipop with giant serrated blades coming out of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So where are you putting it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right in front of her face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like right here? Let her do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it okay?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, yeah, no, my opinions are weird.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And it's going to attack her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll an attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa! That's a natural 19 so I think that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes it does, go ahead and roll damage on that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa! Double eights!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well you cast it at 4th-level you said, right? That's 3d8.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because it's 2nd-level normally, each level you put on top of that--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You get an additional die.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really!?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, for every spell level ahead of two you get another. So 16 plus one more d8.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seven!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So that's 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, 23. Double eights is 16, plus seven is 23.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 23 plus four!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, because of your wisdom. So 27 points of damage. Whack! The serrated edge of the lollipop grinds into her! As it does, black blood spills out from the wound of the chest, the shreds of seaweed and cloth pulling off from the front, exposing the sunken rib cage where the flesh is pulled taut against, and now the wound itself is open and spilling this trail of cloudy black blood in the water.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For my action, I'm going to cast Sacred Flame.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was your bonus action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. Sacred Flame is a cantrip, so go for it. That's wisdom, or dexterity?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dexterity save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dexterity save. That is going to be an 18.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Damn it. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But that was a nice round.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dude, get the fuck out!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Motherfucking dexterity save. That's some bullshit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just watched her dart over you, essentially, Ten feet up above, scoot past, land, and then both Jester and Beau converge and start pummelling her in the hallway.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm just punching the shit out of her while surrounded by rainbow sea horses and a bladed lollipop. This is awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome to Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to also do this. I'm going to do a Sacred Flame.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Dexterity save. That is going to be a 14. I don't believe that--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That does not, because it's a 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, so go ahead and roll damage on that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And that's nine points of radiant damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine points of radiant damage, nice. (spell impact, angry snarl)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't like the look of this thing. I'm going to turn invisible and I'm going to back up a little into the...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you turn invisible and you're going to back up into here, into this little corner?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean down the steps a bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Towards me. Oh, I got a thing still.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, so I'm far enough away from anything that I might need to fuck with.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Got it. And you are invisible there. Good to know. All right, at the end of your turn, the lair action kicks in. Clouded Waters. Now you watch as the silt, the muck, and the bones all of a sudden begin to swirl up into the waters around you and obscure the area. The entire lair is now considered heavily obscured. You cannot see more than five feet in front of you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's now Dashilla's turn. She gets her legendary actions back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, she can't see us! (background music)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is her lair.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She starts 15 feet within--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She does, so immediately she has to take the Spirit Guardians.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And she's hexed on wisdom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Otherwise hex would be super powerful. But she still rolls a 4.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So do full damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That doesn't count because it slipped out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was not intentional.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 points of radiant damage, blasted again as this cluster of vibrant glowing, almost pink pulsing sea horses swirl around and pierce through her chest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sea horses with unicorn horns.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unicorn horns, of course. I assumed!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do they have pissed off expressions or are they happy?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're happy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh good!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're just like "wee!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Be happy in your work.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's very like that Perry Bible Fellowship comic.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah, oh god!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The kid gets impaled by the unicorns; I love it so much. All right, so that happens. The top of her turn. Yeah, nobody's currently feared by her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha is still.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it lasts until the beginning of the next combat round. Okay, she's going to go ahead and do a multi-attack with her claws against Beauregard because she's in melee.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's two strikes against you, these giant bladed, fingered claws. First one is-- that's a natural 14 plus seven. That's 21 to hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The second one is a natural 16.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you get hit from each. You take, from the first strike, 12 points of slashing damage. The second one, 14 points of slashing damage. In what already was clouded silt is now clouded further by your own blood from the slash marks across the front and the side of your neck and jaw, and the pain sears through. In an instant, all you see is the claws streaking through and the glowing yellow eyes before they rescind back into the cloud.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No attack of opportunity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well no, she's going to attempt to move back. Make an attack of opportunity with disadvantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Nope.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking Gil.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that she vanishes into--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The murk. It's just physical crap filling the water?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, just all over. That's going to go ahead and end Dashilla's turn. Fjord, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Am I coherent? Am I awake and alive?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's cool, good!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're a bit shaken by all these visions that keep creeping into your head.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow. I only remember where I kind of last saw her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. I mean you saw her still dart and run this way, and then everything just went dark around you and you can't see more than five feet ahead of you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck me. I don't even know where to send anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's heavily obscured which means you can still attack that direction, but it's at disadvantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to move over to the throne.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And claim it as my own!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And send two Eldritch Blasts towards the area that she's at, at disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, wow, that was--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Desperation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Two strikes at disadvantage, go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plus the d4, that's 14. Plus three is 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That still hits with disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You throw them back out there, and through sheer luck and remembering where she was heading, both blasts-- you don't even see the impact but you hear the (gasp). Roll damage on each of those.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He just threw the basketball over his shoulder from half court.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's ten on the first one, and the second one is nine plus four is 13.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He Sigourney Weavered it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 16 points on the second one, so 26 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck, motherfucker!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that's your action?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's Hex baby. That is my action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you're going to stay there by the throne?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes your go, Fjord. Next up, it is Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will follow suit-- oh wait, she's more than 30 feet away from me, isn't she?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no idea where she is. You know that she's somewhere in this tunnel.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or in that direction.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well then I won't do that. I will-- there's nothing for me to do. There's no do to do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can fire at where she was.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or hold action.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or hold action until she appears, that's smart.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'll just find a little hiding spot somewhere, like around--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're heavily obscured so you can literally hide anywhere right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're in a cloud of murk and gathered sediment.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah! I'll just crouch down then and hold my action until I see her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you hiding then as a bonus?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll stealth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, and then you are holding--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Holding a crossbow bolt until I see her or an enemy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you got it. All right, that finishes your go. Yasha's turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. She doesn't know where she is right? It's clouded as fuck?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's all melee as shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can she dispel the magical effect on the room? I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's not necessarily a magical effect.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, her sword!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Actually, she has Dispel Magic on her sword.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If it's magic.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The Magician's Judge. You can choose to cast Dispel Magic against the target as part of the attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a lair action.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I attack the water?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's less--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's why I asked if it was shit in the water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, not that Yasha would understand with her comparatively limited experience of arcane stuff, but it's not so much magical darkness than it is as much of sediment and silt up in the air by some sort of-- it's up to her, she can give it a shot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. She will put her back against Caleb, back to back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While staying there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Literally back to back with him, shoulder blades against shoulder blades, and hold her attack in case she-bitch shows up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just two bad-asses, back to back, ready to go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where are they?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Her rage will fall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to cast Detect Magic because I have a suspicion that she has something on her, or perhaps the orb in her head. Then I will down the potion that's in my pocket as a bonus action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You cast Detect Magic in a 30 foot radius around you. You sense a powerful magical essence from the throne next to Fjord.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kill Fjord.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so I get six points back from that. I am going to move towards Fjord and crouch behind the table.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A little closer this way, so I'd be between Fjord and the table. Ja, gut.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that ends your turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes. Trying to get cover again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, at the end of your turn, Dashilla's going to use a legendary action to use Forced Vision on you Fjord. As you're there by the side, you look over by the corner and you see-- you don't see Caleb. You see a spirit rushing up towards you with an open maw. Go ahead and make an attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Disadvantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why was it at disadvantage before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because she had Patient Defense on.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But it's a melee attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Against him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's not affected by it because of his armor. He's got Mariner's Armor.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So it doesn't affect just movement. It's everything?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A total of ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, no. As you swing, that little bit in the back of your brain resists, and you can see for a moment through the illusion--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sorry, 11. It's 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With your mage armor I think you're okay, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh yeah. 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah you manage to just pull back enough to pull the blade back and Caleb you watch as it spins past, missing you by inches.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Any excuse to hit Marisha.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The fuck?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Top of the round. It's Beau's go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm in shock still; I'm sorry. Bring back cookies if you're going.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll bring back cookies.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bring back fucking cookies!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sorry!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fucking cookies!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You fucking dick!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's made of fucking cookies!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where is she?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know? I don't see her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She disappeared. You're surrounded by cloud; you can barely see Jester at the peripheral and the floating Spiritual Weapon, and you watch her vanish into this swirling bit of murk.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Going to have to wait until it passes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to hold. I'm going to move down past on the other side of Jester a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right behind her and hold my action until I see her, if she's in range to attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it. All right, so you're holding your attack action. That ends your turn. Caduceus and Jester.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have to spend bonus actions on my turn, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I will go ahead and spend Patient Defense.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: PD!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (low-pitched siren-like sound, then high-pitched siren-like sound) You go first.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not particularly interesting. I'm just going to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You reappear.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I reappear. I'm going to move a little further into the center of the room, and I'm going to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god, it's dead now. To be fair, we've been using it for years. Just at the foot of the stairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, like here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, like there. We'll make a nice long line so it'll be a little touchy-feely thing to get from one side to the other. I'm going to hold my attack until I see her, which is going to be a Sacred Flame.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're holding Sacred Flame.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As a bonus, I'm going to do Healing Word on-- you are probably pretty down, so I will throw you a tiny bit-- it's not a lot, but it's nine points.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, that's pretty good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh, that is good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right, so you're holding Sacred Flame, you said, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, that's--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing, Jester?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess I'll just for my bonus action-- can I swing my lollipop at where I thought she was?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, go ahead and roll attack with disadvantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20 and a 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It hits the fuck out of nothing; she's not there, unfortunately.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Damn it. Okay, then I guess I will hold my spell Guiding Bolt until I see her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. At the end of the turn, the sediment drops. The moment it drops, she appears.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Be at range, bitch!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She is over here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's on fucking range!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You unfortunately do not see her; she's around the corner from you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's fine. I see them firing and so I just shoot at them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So excited in the moment!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ahh!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Light it up!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's amazing! All right, so roll your damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 4d6 times two?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And save against dex 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural 19.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Motherfucker.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, nice!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, all I need.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 32 points of radiant damage and next is advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Reappears, at which point, the next lair action is going to be Tethering Walls. Any creature within ten feet of a wall must make a dexterity saving throw. That's going to be Jester, Beau's just out of range, Caduceus. Everybody but Jester, ten feet from a wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everybody but me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. No, sorry, everybody but Beau. Beau's the one who's central to this chamber.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha has advantage on those.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She does. What's up?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've got a d4 on saves also. Dex save?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dex save, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Success.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 20 for Fjord and a 19 for Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Great, success.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Didn't have to roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sorry, not you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Success.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Success.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, it wraps around and pulls Caduceus to the wall. You are grappled and you take 11 points of poison damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dashilla is going to go ahead and move ten feet up to Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She has to make a saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I shoot her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, she actually started within the range, so she makes it. You do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She started within 15 feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do. Go ahead and make your attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 hits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am hidden from her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sneak attack?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Uh-huh. 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 points of damage, oof. Nice. Then the save against yours, a natural 19. So she takes half damage. Still roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, that's a one. Okay. Oh, that's shit. Five. It looks like a seven.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It does. It's not a good dice. You should throw that one away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five points of damage, reduced to two. She's going to rush toward you and take two claw strikes at you. Natural 19! Wow, fucking 19s this past round. Yeah, that's a 26 to hit you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On the second strike, a natural 17.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That also hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, they both hit you. You take, ooh, 19 points of slashing damage from the first hit and 17 points of slashing damage from the second.

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Damn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's ten feet of movement, and she's going to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I use Hellish Rebuke!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You could hear the thought burst forth: Don't forget about it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 15 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice! Dashilla's looking really bad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As she hits me, my eyes flare white, and I go: Aah! Like that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's going to use the rest of her movement--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Speed is halved.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Speed is halved on the movement, so that's (counting) 60.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, shit balls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, not 50, technically, because 50 is her swimming speed. So right there.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: She's fleeing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the end of Dashilla's turn. Fjord, you're up first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Teleport! I don't know, can't you teleport or something?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is she trying to run?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Technically, I think you have line of sight, from what I'm looking at right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you jump up, you do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It is water. There is a vertical aspect you guys can use if you want to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why not. I'll go, (impacts).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll attacks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kill her. Come on. That's good!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a 26 and a 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both hit. Roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, so 12, 15 points on the first one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you add your--? Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nine points on the second one, so 19 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 points on the second one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, 19 points total between the two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Fuck, man, she's right on the cusp! All right. That finishes your turn?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Legendary action, she's going to Shifting Speed--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Damn it!

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20, and is out of sight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You still know where she is because of Hex, though, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hex doesn't work that way. That's Hunter's Mark. All right, that finishes Fjord's turn. Nott?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go fight her!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll run after her, but it's half speed, so I'll get 45 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (mini clicking on map) You still don't see her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't see her! That's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends your turn. Yasha?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you hold until you--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He used action, movement, and bonus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who's up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is now Yasha.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, right, that's me. Fuck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cad's still grappled.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Help.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah. She'll go through and take some swipes at the kelp, trying to loosen Caduceus. Or would it be better to grab you and fucking pull?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If she rages in advance, she can use advantage on the athletics check. Up to you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (German accent) Ja, let's do the raging.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ashley?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. So two athletics, you said?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. Athletics with advantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking what? 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14's enough. The DC to break is 12.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know the scale, Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's seaweed. But yeah. She reaches forward and grabs Caduceus and pulls him away from the side so now you're no longer grappled. You can move.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yay! Thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's her action and her bonus. That finishes Yasha's go. Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, this is a fucked situation. I am going to hold Magic Missile at second level if she appears.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just in case.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That finishes Caleb's go. Top of the round, Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am burning a Step of the Wind and I am hauling ass towards the direction that Nott ran. I have 135 feet movement speed with that, so that, halved.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Halved, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So 60?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's pitiful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can move four squares per go, so another (counting) four. You get out the side and you can see--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, get her!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She hasn't had a chance to hide yet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (excited yelling)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shuriken!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: God, I wish I had something that would-- I just see her though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see her right there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can't attack her? You can't--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're right there. She probably busted everything to get there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Throw a shuriken.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That the end of your turn?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't think I have anything else.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: End of your turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just go: I see her!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Legendary action. She's going to go ahead and Shift Speed again. Looks over the corner and sees you (hissing) and goes ahead and darts out of sight once more.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know the direction where she curved around though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes your go. Caduceus and Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I-- oof.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just going to do the-- Fjord, you should probably get what we're looking for and get after her. I'm going to hightail it towards where she was heading.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But the throne!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's as close as you can get right there, I'll say.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Including burning an action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, with burning an action you can get there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Still have a reaction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can take a little more damage before I'm awful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That finishes your go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I turn to Fjord; I go: The orb! Fjord, do you see the orb? Do I see the orb?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do not see the orb, no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to stay here. No, I'm going to go after everybody else.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But Oskar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That a double move?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I'm going to cast--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's as far as you can get on your single move there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Has anybody-- has Nott been hit at all?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nott's never hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I bonus action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rogues, man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I bonus action and still get the Dash thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah because it's your action to move.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, cool. Then for my bonus action I'm going to-- oh right, the Spiritual Weapon. I was going to cast Mass Healing Word, but that's a third level.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, you can't do that, no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Never mind. Yeah, I'll bring my Spiritual Weapon with me and then I guess I'll keep going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there, all right. You move (counting) 20; you get up to the edge there. Well, technically 15; you only move 30. All right, that finishes Jester's turn. All of the seaweed falls back into a casual place. The next lair action is going to be the Lament of the Dead.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The dead spirits now begin to fall through at different angles out of the sides of the walls and drifting through. Everybody once more needs to make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everybody?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everybody.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, remember your extra d4. I forgot them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Through the halls, through everything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Success.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Success.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is a wisdom?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. DC is 12 on this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 16 and a 13 for Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both successes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Success.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Success.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 11, doesn't matter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Huh?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's right, you're--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuck you, ghost.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lair action, no effect. All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry, Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, don't apologize.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) He hates us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord, what do you do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to turn with the falchion in my hand and search the throne for--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a search action?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check for me. I'll say with advantage because you have the falchion drawn. You can sense the presence of something important.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it investigation?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 will do it. Going to the throne and sensing with the sword like a homing beacon, you feel the strong source where the cushion in the front of the throne is. It's partially rotted, and you can see where once was red, nice velvet materials has blackened over time and general sediment in the area, and then minerals, begin to gather at the corners. You reach down and tear across the front and pull it open, and as you do, there immediately glowing from underneath, you see the yellow sphere giving off a faint aura of light.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I reach for it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll let you do that, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Put it in your belly!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eat it! Put it in your butt!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I do anything else with it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say, for the time being there is no immediate threat. Dashilla has fled. You can continue to search for her, if you'd like.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I want to go back and get that money that she's got. No?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, but for the time being, Dashilla has not-- at least, for the time being.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'd rather not have this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So my held Magic Missile fizzles because time passes, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know that yet, I'm going to keep looking for her over here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You continue to move into the next area.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't feel okay with you being alone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm hauling ass.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm still going with her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You scoot around the area. Beau, you start moving through in this vicinity.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mm-hmm, looking for anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott, you doing the same?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to do the same.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott, you're not as fast as her, so you're falling a bit behind. Actually, no, you can do all three with your bonus action. Well, you both can, just in case you want to spend ki points.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nah, not now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have a question to you, when you've done that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Back in the chamber, Detect Magic is still up. Does Caleb see anything with an arcane glow in this room other than what Fjord picked up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Only the aura from the table.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I guess I will start studying the runes on the walls to see how they contribute to this mystery.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make an arcana check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This gets the d4?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Checks, no. Saves and attacks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hard to pick up the details of these particular runes. They seem of a similar age as the ones you saw on the table, but it's not the same enchantment. You pick up that they are placed there for some reason, but you're unable to ascertain what it is, unfortunately.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On a whim, I'm going to use a 2nd-level spell slot to cast Comprehend Language instantly to see if anything becomes clearer, and I have to touch the table and touch the walls to do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They may or may not be connected to the table altar in the center.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are we doing here, Fjord?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I hold up the sphere in one hand and the falchion in the other?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do they react to each other?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both get brighter.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I try and hold the sphere to my chest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you may. As you take the sphere and press it to your chest, your eyes suddenly flash images of black, sub-ocean darkness, the same place your dreams have brought you over and over again, and that bright yellow light emerges, breaking the shadow, and there you see the yellow eye with two more on the sides of it. You see the endless row of teeth that curves into the smile-- and the flash is gone, and you look down and your hand is empty. The rest of you watched this thing momentarily seem to become either ethereal or it is absorbed into Fjord's chest. You look at the sword, and now there's the eye in the hilt and the eye in the pommel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's tight!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh, hotness! Mmm. Let's kill this bitch and get the fuck out of here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we need to kill her? You have what you came for.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure, we can let her go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We should go, she's not going to follow us to the surface.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's get some platinum before we leave though, what, what?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This pedestal, are we going to just leave it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What difference does it make?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are your goals? Your goal is, what, to--?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was only curious about the orb, but it just seems so--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know what Avantika talked about, you know what she wanted. You think this has nothing to do with that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The temple I was in before had a recessed spot for the sphere. That just seems like a rune right, like a symbol?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, but if that was some sort of lock, you want to put the key in that lock?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you feel any different?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just, on our guard as we go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, on our guard, of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While you're beginning to initiate the looting process, what are you doing, Caduceus?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am basically holding ready to shoot a bolt at anything that moves, and I was actually hanging a little bit far down just in case one of them drops, I can heal, and somewhere where I'm not going to get attacked by kelp and I'm keeping very aware.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Well, you were staying over in this chamber with them. Nott and Beau, you are in the central chamber now. Do you want to search for the possible whereabouts of Dashilla?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to look around and then I want to head towards that alcove back there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm following to make sure she's okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I technically haven't heard shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of you make perception checks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, no, you're right, you haven't.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you turn around the corner and you edge in here, you see movement behind the seaweed, using it as a blanket and a shield.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In this corridor or in the central chamber?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where you're looking, you see it move this direction. You're not sure which path, but Dashilla is still present it seems, or something moving through the seaweed as a cover, behind it like a curtain. Which path do you choose?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I turn to Nott and say: Are we still fighting this thing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? I don't see anything. Where?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's this way! I move that way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which way?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Towards wherever I saw her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You saw her move in the direction of this fork.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Of this side fork, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This side? You saw her move in this direction, you saw it move through.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just pick one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll take the right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Take the right? Okay. You move through, and you're following?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As I go, I take out my wire and I point and I whisper a message to Caleb: We went back to the left fork but then we went right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wrapping up in here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you come around the corner, you see an old, decomposing pile of merrow corpses similar to the ones that were tied up inside, but these all have these wounds of their throats slit from side to side.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, sacrifice style.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're all in various states of decomposition, the freshest one maybe months ago, and the sea has caused its own unique form of bloating and sloughing off of the various parts of the skeleton.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Gross.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is she in here? Do we see any movement?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can make another perception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would have made my way a little bit further.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All of us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Instead, it's a five!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glancing inside and taking a moment to really look around, there's no other movement.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Other way?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys shift around.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cast a quick message: We went on the other one now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you turn around to the other side, there you see standing there, another pale, gaunt spirit looking right at you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go fuck a ghost! I punch it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to go fuck a ghost!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who runs in a haunted house now? That's fucking amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Too slow, shit stain!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's cocked. Not good. It's 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 just hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ghost puncher!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (singing) Ghost puncher!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Puncher of ghosts.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's terrible! Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five points of damage, okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Another five damage!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Another five damage, okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Déjà vu.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still have your bonus action.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to punch him again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're hitting his pressure points.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What the fuck? All three ones on her d6s.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's another five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 points of damage. You punch the shit out of a ghost. Now, because I believe at level seven you have the capability of--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To punch ghosts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To punch ghosts!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can punch ghosts now. My fists are magical.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With each punch, you watch as the somewhat spectral glow scatters at each impact, and as she pulls back there are three holes in its form where the fists passed through. The ghost, which was normally just staring, goes (ghastly groan) in surprise.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can see this happen right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know, I go: Caduceus!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sacred Flame.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a three.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's ten points of radiant damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Nott, are you doing anything?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is the ghost still alive?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ghost is still alive, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will fire at this ghost.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not great, 12-- no, 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 hits, roll damage. It is adjacent to Beau so you get sneak attack on the ghost.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's really good. Jesus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It dissipates. You watch as its glow vanishes. This horrible low, dull, vibrating sigh slowly goes away and it's no more and he's immaterial.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You punched that ghost really well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm staying right at them and I'm looking for any movement while all this is happening.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
