lines.text: Can we go deeper into that chamber? Searching for movement?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of you guys make perception checks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You don't see any movement in that corner. You do, looking inside, see in the far back a small hole maybe two inches across where the base of it-- of the small alcove-- ends. You hear voices.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's a passage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can see through to the other side!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's only two inches wide?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about two inches wide.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll go over to it and say: Hey guys, can you hear us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're looting the place, you hear these voices.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Nott? Is that you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. We're in a hole.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you okay?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we're fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you kill the thing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, we lost her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, well I'm getting some treasure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Save some for me!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll turn to Caleb and say: Listen, this is more your thing than mine, but aren't you at least curious about what this pedestal does?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I have some ideas and I am curious, but I want to know what you intend. These come in threes, yeah?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I don't think it has anything to do with the sphere; it's not like the lock or the temple that I saw before. The top of this pedestal is covered in rust?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Blood?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aren't you the least bit curious what a little drippy-drip might do? (background music)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm always curious. Can I count on you to return the favor?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Always.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (slicing) (slamming)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You suffer three points of damage. As you place your hand down on it, you see this dull red glow around the hand that's placed on the table. As you begin to pull your hand up and look, the runes where the blood has splattered have begun to give a faint glow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Has anything changed with the ones on the walls?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I've rolled ass all night, and a natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance over and you can see a faint, matching, dull red glow on one of the runes across the way, just barely peeking through some of the gently shifting seaweed. Looking down at this table, you need a lot of blood to continue to do this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. You'll kill yourself!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We saw a pile of corpses!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I put my--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How much damage are you willing to take, guys?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: About nine more.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll take 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (groans)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What are you fucking doing, lopping off your arm?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys begin carving into your hands--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are you-- why?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just trying to provoke some chance here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Cure Wounds as they're hurting themselves.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's almost full, the table isn't there yet. You have about two-thirds to three-quarters or so. The room itself now is beginning to generally have a red hue to it as each of these runes is beginning to fill the area.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (whispering) This is such a bad idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To you, Caleb, six points.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 12 points healed to you, Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Is there a chance that we're giving this to her?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm following your lead here. This is your quest. I have things that I need to do that are not here, and I am going to need help.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I understand. I think we're good. We can go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Damn it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We understand each other. Cut palm to cut palm.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) Blood brothers, so cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll start to head out of the chamber.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I follow Fjord out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nott and I meet the rest of them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to try to get as much platinum and stuff as I can before I walk out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am just waiting for something to move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ten. Nine. But there were piles of shiny things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. You gather in pocket, and counting it later, you will find that you have found roughly three platinum, six gold, 12 silver, and about 65 copper.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Boo.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't like this place.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. I'll follow them out. I'll tap Yasha: We should get out of here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's got an uncomfortable look on her face after watching all this transpire, goes, "Yeah. I "think we better should."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't like it either, Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Her brow tenses and she follows you out. As you all converge towards the central chamber once more--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The guards are floating, following us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're walking, some of the seaweed reaches out and the unicorns (fizzle). It lasts for ten minutes, right? As you approach they eventually flitter out. You all gather there at the entrance.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we out of the cavern now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you all backing out of the cavern?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Looking out for this hag as we go, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. For those who haven't rolled perception checks on this, which I think would be Jester, Caleb, and Fjord, go ahead and roll for me. And Yasha.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh. Still terrible. Ten.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 18. Yasha rolled a seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No sign of movement. No idea where she is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to back out slowly, get out of this cavern. Does everyone want to meet me right-- once we can see the surface of the water?

lines.name: MARISHA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we there? We done?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (snapping) Water Walk.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are going to jet to the surface of the water. It's 60 feet around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thanks to the glory of magic, we're not going to deal with decompression in the bloodstream.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plus, there's water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Instant TPK.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's not air. It's water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, the magic is pulling-- Yeah, it's fine! Magic handwave. It'd be the saddest-- Smash cut to the outside of the Squalleater.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (choking, bursting)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's all just the end of Total Recall, right there in the middle of the ocean.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It wouldn't be a pressure thing because we have water in us anyway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. I'm saying through the magic, it all works out fine. As you guys all swim out of the cavern, the spell happens. With immense speed, you all start firing towards the surface (splashing) with enough force that when you surface, you all lift a few feet out and then land. Some of you stumble, but you hit the surface of the water, and it feels like ground.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's walk to the ship.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We were hundreds of feet under water.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's why I made sure to pack some stuff, just in case. Let's get out of here. That place gives me the creeps.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And Dashilla lives to keep being a legend.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To keep pouring blood on, well...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am deeply curious as to what the fuck happened.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys can see the Squalleater is a bit of a hike from where you currently are from where you've traveled, but it is visible as there is no other landmass on the horizon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll be moving at twice speed since it's normal speed and not our halved speed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Outstanding.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like I'm walking on jello, but I like it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You ever see those videos with the (tapping) walking on the pudding. Like that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys make your way towards the Squalleater, hail your team, and are brought back onto the ship. The sails are unfurled. As Orly turns to you, he goes, "Where we going, Captain?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Make for the... Gravid Archipelago?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gravid Archipelago, all righty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's not where we were going before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Aye, aye."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure it is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I thought we were going to the other place--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ship unfurls the functional sails on it and slowly limps its way in the direction of the archipelago. You travel for a good hour or so before you notice the sky that was somewhat cloudy, begin to go rapidly darker, roughly near where you were. The clouds begin to swell and release rain. It begins to rain on your ship, but you begin to push away from this mounting storm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She can control the weather?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get the sense that whatever ritual you began, once she felt safe, she had completed and a new storm is being summoned over the Diver's Grave.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit. We could have sunk our ship.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You would have sunk our ship.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We would have been walking for a long time!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All of that, as to why are there are fucking ships at the bottom of the ocean.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At least there would have been a hell of a skill challenge to get the Squalleater out of the center of that storm. As you barely skirt the outside of this growing storm with enough foresight and speed to not be caught in the brunt of it, we'll end tonight's game.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I want to do that because we've got a fucked up ship.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, you do whatever you want to do. You're the captain.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll say we'll go to the Bisaft Isle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bisaft Isle to get repairs done?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought you were just blind with power.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I thought you were doing it on purpose.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like, (clapping) fuck that!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I want to repair the ship.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would assume that next game, we're going to start with a fresh day, so I want to toss in that Caleb goes to whatever chamber they're in and he pulls out the other book from his holsters and he writes for hours.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. We'll pick up there next week, and we'll have a guest next week.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three years in the making, I think it is?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At least two. Excited she's going to be joining us, and we'll pick up this next thread of the story. Well done, guys! That was fun and Dashilla survived!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dashilla survived!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You monsters!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That would have been a thing if we had gotten up and it was like all stormy, and we were like (high-pitched) "Where's the boat?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, if that had happened while you guys got out of the cave, you would have looked up and that sunlight was much darker, and it would have been you start seeing the shifting in the tumultuous surface and be like, "Oh, no."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, man, I have been ordered to provoke every once in a while.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sometimes you got to poke the badger, and I respect that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I came out of that with a favor.

lines.name: TRAVIS, MATT
lines.text: You did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering) (no audio) [water bubbling] [thunder] [explosion] (chanting) Role! Critical! Role! [dramatic Critical Role theme]

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Villains beware 'cause you're 'bout to be dead.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (singing) They got magic and flair, they got falchions and cunning. They don't see over there there's a monster incoming. Inspiration is waiting, rise up, don't think twice. Put your fate in your hands, take a chance, roll the dice! (chanting) Role! Critical! Role!

lines.name: ASHLEY, LAURA
lines.text: (singing) Can you answer the call? Dig in deep in your soul as the legend unfolds. Now it's your turn to roll! [fire burning] [music]
